TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Span`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class Span

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: Provides a type- and memory-safe representation of a contiguous region of arbitrary memory.

span.span: Provides a type- and memory-safe representation of a contiguous region of arbitrary memory.

remarks.format: `Span` [ref 구조체](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type) 스택에 대신 관리 되는 힙에 할당 된입니다.`Span` is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type) that is allocated on the stack rather than on the managed heap. Ref 구조체 형식의 boxed 수 없는 형식의 변수에 할당할 수 등 관리 되는 힙에 승격 없습니다 것을 확인에 대 한 제한에 번호가 , `dynamic`, 및 임의의 인터페이스 형식으로.Ref struct types have a number of restrictions to ensure that they cannot be promoted to the managed heap, including that they can't be boxed and they can't be assigned to variables of type , `dynamic`, and to any interface type. A `Span` 인스턴스는 대개 배열 요소 또는 배열의 일부를 보관 합니다.A `Span` instance is often used to hold the elements of an array or a portion of an array. 그러나 배열 달리는 `Span` 인스턴스 관리 되는 메모리, 기본 메모리를 가리킬 수 또는 메모리에서 관리 되는 스택 합니다.Unlike an array, however, a `Span` instance can point to managed memory, native memory, or memory managed on the stack.

summary.span: Creates a new object from a specified number of bytes starting at a specified memory address.

span.span: Creates a new object from a specified number of bytes starting at a specified memory address.

remarks.format: This constructor should be used with care, since it creates arbitrarily typed `T`s from a `void*`-typed block of memory, and `length` is not checked. However, if the constructor succeeds in creating a new <xref:System.Span%601> object, all subsequent uses are correct.

is negative.

This is because is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type) that cannot be boxed and therefore cannot be converted to an . - 경우 유형의 `obj` 않습니다는 , 메서드 호출에서 throw 한 합니다.If the type of `obj` is not a , the method call throws a . 두 개를 비교 하려면 개체가 같은지를 사용 하 여는 비교 연산자.To compare two objects for equality, use the comparison operator.
